scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.dev-js: cp build/*.map dist/ && cp src/*.jpg dist/ && parcel src/index.js.html
scripts.dev: npm run asbuild && cp build/*.map dist/ && cp build/*.wasm dist/ && cp src/*.jpg dist/ && parcel src/index.html
scripts.deploy: parcel build  --public-url ./ src/index.html && git add dist && git commit -m "auto deploy" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
